member.summary: Sends an email one at a time, with variable data for each message body Uses String.Format to handle a template. Dim Template As string = "Confirmation email for {0}. " + _ "Date: {1}. Weeks: {2}\n" + _ "Name: {3}\n" + _ "{4}" String.Format(Template, "Spot1", Date.UtcNow, "Spot3", "Spot4")
member.param: email address and all the data for that email message
